Leeds Quant Crim

A group of researchers interested in quantitative criminology. Based at the University of Leeds.

Meetings

The quant-crim group meet once a month, usually on a Wednesday afternoon. This page contains some of the minutes and presentations from our meetings.

If you would like to be added to the list, please email Nick Malleson

  • 26 Oct 2016 » Graham Farrell (October 2016)
  • 28 Sep 2016 » Victoria Spaiser (September 2016)
  • 20 Apr 2016 » Agent-Based Modelling (April 2016)
  • 16 Mar 2016 » Emily Sheard (March 2016)
  • 24 Feb 2016 » Johanna Schoenhofer and Richard Mann (February 2016)
  • 20 Jan 2016 » Our First Meeting (Janurary 2016)
